title: WHIRLING F3 ORB / peephole shivers
description:
1. Doomed felt.
2. This is not just a hole -- this is a peephole.

dialogueTree.title: Electrochemistry: "You can almost *see* the shape of a..."
dialogueTree.text: You can almost *see* the shape of a man and a woman, writhing inside -- bathed in drug sweat and dirty linens. Bottles lie around everywhere...

links.title: You: ""I think I can see into Klaasje's b..."
links.text: "I think I can see into Klaasje's bedroom from here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He leans closer to inspect the peep..."
links.text: He leans closer to inspect the peephole. "You can barely see through. Better not to jump to *sensationalist* conclusions here."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The footprints on the floor, howev..."
links.text: "The footprints on the floor, however..." He points to the marks nearby, on the floor. "*Definitely* suspicious."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Boring footprints. I want to jump t..."
links.text: Boring footprints. I want to jump to sensationalist conclusions.

links.title: You: "What were those people doing -- in..."
links.text: What were those people doing -- in there?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You lean closer to the peephole, in..."
links.text: You lean closer to the peephole, instinctively. I bet they're doing something quite *unnatural* there. Sensationally unnatural.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "If your mesolimbic reward pathway w..."
links.text: If your mesolimbic reward pathway were to venture a guess: one of the bottles is probably being *put* somewhere it doesn't belong.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "And were your glands to venture *an..."
links.text: And were your glands to venture *another* guess -- they would add that *another* bottle is being put somewhere very close to that. The bottle is a bit smaller you see.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Also! You can literally put speed u..."
links.text: Also! You can literally put speed up your asshole, did you know? Enters the bloodstream right through the mucus membrane! So yeah, that's definitely *also* taking place.
